title: 87/550/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 November 1987 re- establishing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 November 1987
re-establishing the status of certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany with regard to classical swine fever
(87/550/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The officially swine-fever free status of Unterfranken in the Federal Republic of Germany is re-established.
The swine-fever free status of Weser-Ems in the Federal Republic of Germany is re-established.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
